result.eng: It was the Normans who started the habit of shaving beards and cutting hair.
result.ga: B'iad na Normannaigh a thosaigh an nós féasóg a bhearradh agus gruaig a ghearradh
result.orig: B'iad na Normannaigh a thosaigh an nós féasóg a bhearradh agus gruaig a ghearradh
result.html: B'iad na Normannaigh a thosaigh an nós féasóg a bhearradh agus gruaig a ghearradhIt was the Normans who started the habit of shaving beards and cutting hair.
result.ponchtml: B'iad na Normannaiġ a ṫosaiġ an nós féasóg a ḃearraḋ agus gruaig a ġearraḋIt was the Normans who started the habit of shaving beards and cutting hair.

result.html: Bhí sí do mo bhearradhShe was shaving me.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí do mo ḃearraḋShe was shaving me.
